title: Market share of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: This statistic displays the Market share of global share streaming devices segment as of 2014 , States Streaming .
In this year , Roku Nephew held 24 % of the global Market for share streaming devices segment .
Roku Nephew are a British-based Streaming that specializes in manufacturing medical equipment such as arthroscopy products and share streaming devices products .
gold: The statistic shows a breakdown of the U.S. American streaming devices market according to market share in 2014 . Google 's Chromecast held a market share of 14 percent in 2014 .
